title: Improve Code Readability
description: Refactor cryptic code to be clear and readable
starterCode:
# Make this code readable
def f(x,y,z):
    return x*y+z if x>0 and y>0 else 0

print(f(5,3,10))
print(f(-1,3,10))
solution:
# Refactored for readability
def calculate_price_with_tax(price, quantity, tax):
    """Calculate total price including tax."""
    if price > 0 and quantity > 0:
        return price * quantity + tax
    return 0

print(calculate_price_with_tax(5, 3, 10))
print(calculate_price_with_tax(-1, 3, 10))
hints: Use descriptive function and variable names
Add docstrings to explain what the function does
Use multi-line if statements for clarity
